TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JpegBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class JpegBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定义用于编码联合图像专家组 (JPEG) 格式图像的编码器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 格式的位图支持帧级缩略图和帧级元数据。 format bitmaps support frame level thumbnails and frame level metadata. 它们不支持预览、 全局缩略图、 全局元数据或多个帧。They do not support preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 编码不工作不在部分信任环境中。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)有关部分信任的信息。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool FlipHorizontal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在编码期间是否应水平翻转[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

value.span: 如果要在编码期间水平翻转图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image is flipped horizontally during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 水平翻转的源映像是无损转换，并替换任何以前的无损转换。The horizontal flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool FlipVertical { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在编码期间是否应垂直翻转[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.

value.span: 如果要在编码期间垂直翻转图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image is flipped vertically during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垂直翻转的源映像是无损转换，并替换任何以前的无损转换。The vertical flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int QualityLevel { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示所生成[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像的质量等级。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
The quality level of the JPEG image.

value.span: 值范围是 1 （最低质量） 到 100 （最高质量） （含)。

span.span: The value range is 1 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality) inclusive.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation Rotation { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示要将[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 图像旋转的角度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.
The degree to which the image is rotated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在 90 度的增量，旋转受到支持。Rotation is supported only in 90-degree increments. 旋转表示无损转换的源映像，并替换任何以前的无损转换。The rotation represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
